import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent implements OnInit{ constructor(){} ngOnInit(): void { throw new Error('Method not implemented.'); } registerForm=new FormGroup( fname=new FormControl(""), username:new FormControl(""), email:new FormControl(""), password:new FormControl(""), phonenumber:new FormControl(""), role:new FormControl("") ); }

Role
